org.jwave.view

Class ScreenLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jwave.view.ScreenLoader

  • public final class ScreenLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class to load and store the .fxml nodes of the view. The caching mechanism is useful when switching between views it prevents to reload the nodes and all the values stored in their components (textboxes content, sliders position, ecc...). It is also possible to force the reloading of the nodes for heavy .fxml files instead of keeping them cached.
